article_title: Booz Allen Hamilton Acquires Genova Technologies To Boost Affordable Care Act, Healthcare Support - Page: 1

article_metadata.news_keywords: booz allen hamilton, affordable care act contracts, cms contracts, genova technologies, federal technology contracts, healthcare contracts

og.description: The company expects the deal to give Booz Allen a leg up on federal technology contracts around healthcare and the Affordable Care Act.
og.title: Booz Allen Hamilton Acquires Genova Technologies To Boost Affordable Care Act, Healthcare Support

article_metadata.keywords: booz allen hamilton, affordable care act contracts, cms contracts, genova technologies, federal technology contracts, healthcare contracts
article_metadata.description: Booz Allen Hamilton has acquired the healthcare division of Genova Technologies for an undisclosed amount to give it a leg up on federal technology contracts around healthcare and the Affordable Care Act. Page: 1
